posts.description: The NSA Leak Is Real, Snowden Documents Confirm
posts.extended: On Monday, a hacking group calling itself the “ShadowBrokers” announced an auction for what it claimed were “cyber weapons” made by the NSA.

posts.description: Former Politico CEO Jim VandeHei Hires 2 for Upcoming Project | FishbowlNY
posts.extended: Former Politico CEO Jim VandeHei and chief political writer Mike Allen haven’t launched their media venture yet, but they have made several hires. The latest additions, according to CNNMoney, are Alexis Lloyd and Matt Boggie. They both previously worked for The New York Times.
